short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All you need to know to sell in MercadoLibre

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chego summarize information about MercadoLibre search queries providing sellers with insights about the market and buyers with a broad view of a product search.
The extension displays a table with all items contained in a MercadoLibre search query obtaining data available in the particular item publication. It allows the user to compare two or more products without having to click on the item link, then going back and then clicking on the second item link.
